data.title: Hyperion – VOTEC Group
data.text:
Integrate operational and financial planning with Oracle Hyperion and Enterprise Performance Management (EPM)

As operating environments grow more complex and competition intensifies, organizations need to efficiently integrate diverse platforms and planning functions to enhance efficiencies, and reduce costs. The Oracle Hyperion Suite of Enterprise Performance Management (EPM) applications allow businesses to effectively integrate and proactively manage and measure their goals, strategies and execution. VOTEC Group delivers a comprehensive, integrated suite of EPM applications featuring common Web and Microsoft Office interfaces, reporting tools, mobile information delivery, and administration.

Drive profitable performance and impeccable financial results

With our rich industry knowledge base and experience with Oracle Hyperion’s suite of EPM applications, VOTEC Group provides you strategic consulting expertise to successfully implement global financial consolidation solutions via Hyperion Financial Management. Our team of experts has guided countless clients across all industry verticals on ways to improve and exceed their operational and financial performance goals. Oracle EPM consultants at VOTEC Group have gained practical industry experience and are specialized in implementations and upgrades of all modules and versions of Hyperion, including:

Strategy Management

Planning, Budgeting and Forecasting

Financial Close and Reporting

Profitability Management

We partner with our clients through all phases of the Hyperion project lifecycle by delivering the following services:

Project Management

Functional Consulting

Technical Consulting

Migrations and Upgrades

Project Auditing

System Integration

Reporting

Implementation and Configuration

Interface Design and Development

Get more than what you think for your Hyperion and Oracle EPM requirements with services from VOTEC Group

We are an Oracle Gold partner and have rich experience in helping customers understand, deploy, and support their investments in Oracle’s Hyperion and EPM applications. Our goal is to deliver high value in the services we provide while generating the lowest cost of ownership. Key benefits of partnering with us include:
